website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably priced loose powder that works well for most who try it. This true translucent powder won't change the color of your foundation or concealer.
pros: In addition to setting the face with a matte finish, this loose powder blurs imperfections for a flawless look
Lasts all day for most wearers, and a little goes a long way
Wears well over other makeup products
No sheen or color for true translucent wear
cons: Can look chalky on deeper skin tones
Some users notice a bit of flashback in photos when wearing it

customer_reviews.title: Great product for great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most inexpensive setting powder I've seen around and it absolutely does the trick. I have caramel brown skin and it does not give you the "ghost face" you might get with other white translucent powders. I get oily throughout the day and this really keeps it at bay. Why spend the big bucks when this works just fine. There's not much product it the small jar but a little goes a long way so you will not run out too fast.
customer_reviews.author: T&A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect setting powder for GREAT price!
customer_reviews.text: Being a makeup fanatic, I was hesitant to purchase this product because I usually tend to go for more "expensive" beauty brands. However after much research I had seen reviews about this being a perfect dupe for the product I wanted. I am SO pleased I purchased this instead of the product that was easily $20+.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Jurgens

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps your make-up put! My face stays matte all day, love it!
customer_reviews.author: ZombieJo89

customer_reviews.title: Sheer and invisible.
customer_reviews.text: Goes on sheer and mattifies without looking chalky, dry or flat /overly matte. It sets makeup nicely, doesn't emphasize fine lines and gives a nice polished look to my skin. I was using clinique blended powder in invisible blend but I think I like this one more. It truly doesn't look like I'm wearing powder. I haven't taken pictures with flash so I don't know if it photographs well but in natural daylight, it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: MLK77

customer_reviews.title: White face
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be greatcstiff from the reviews I read. It makes your face white. No matter how light you use it. I don’t see why people like this product. It’s useless.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: I just received this product and love it already
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product and love it already. It is lightweight and lasts all day. My t-zone typically becomes shiny by lunch time, but this product helped to eliminate the shine all day. It blurs imperfections a bit, but is not a miracle worker, so it works great over foundation & concealer. I very much like this product and will continue to use it. Also, the white does not effect the coloration of your skin. It does not create a ghost-like appearance, rather, it blends into your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Lightbody

customer_reviews.title: Hardly Any Product!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would’ve listened to other reviews. Inside this big container is barely any product. There should’ve been a disclaimer. Not worth anything more than $1. Will not purchase again! I’m so disappointed. I’m not sure if this is how it comes in the store or if product was taken out before it was sent to me. It did NOT come in a package nor the lid taped shut.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm not big on makeup... I love a VERY natural youthful look. I wear bb cream and moisturizer and that's pretty much it, maybe some eyeliner and lipstick. I was very shiny around my T zone and I didn't want to buy a powder that I'd have to re-apply through-out the day. I used a little of this on my T zone after my BB cream and it lasted pretty much the entire day... even after a few sweaty bouts of Florida sunshine. The price for Prime beats driving to the store. I will purchase again. The powder is super fine and can get everywhere if you're not careful. Goes on light and breezy. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: TonicShopper

customer_reviews.title: I've had this powder on my face all day and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this powder on my face all day and my makeup still looks fresh. Zero shine and I'm loving it! It really is translucent and left no trace of Cor behind. I'll definitely be purchasing again when I'm out.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Best Setting Powder Ever
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this setting powder. A small amount goes a long way and it makes my skin feel soft and flawless. It's great for that annoying mid-day shine and fantastic for the first and final step in your make up routine. It's lightweight and doesn't feel like I'm caking on product. It works PERFECTLY! :)
customer_reviews.author: EmilyRae

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is absolutely AMAZING! I have been using expensive name-brand setting/finishing powder ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is absolutely AMAZING! I have been using expensive name-brand setting/finishing powder for awhile now and decided to look for a cheaper alternative... and I found it! Trust me, you'll love this powder. It sets on my Estee Double Wear foundation perfectly, doesn't distract from the color, and doesn't look chalky. It still looks great at the end of the day too. This will be my new forever powder!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm a cosmetologist/makeup artist and even like this (even though it's a drugstore product)
customer_reviews.text: For those of you who have allergies you should try this one out. I end up sneezing ALL DAY with other makeup brands when I use any type of loose powders, and this is the only one I've never had a problem with. As for how well it works, it does a pretty decent job at keeping everything in place and keeping your face looking matte. It doesn't dry out my skin as well so that's another bonus. I've bought it again because I like it way more than the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I use this product every day- I have to buy it here because it is always out of stock in stores. The powder has a very small grain (smaller than powder foundation) so it is extremely light and airy. Makes my skin feel smooth and soft and lessens appearance of pores. Usually by 2-3 at a time because I don't want to run out and go a day without it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect powder
customer_reviews.text: This powder is light soft and perfect. I use it to set my eyebrows and it does a PHENOMINAL job. Worth it will purchase again even if I only use it to set my eyebrows it's worth it. Amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Duchess

customer_reviews.title: If you plan on taking any pictures while wearing this ...
customer_reviews.text: If you plan on taking any pictures while wearing this product, I suggest you don't. There will be the appearance of white all over your face.
customer_reviews.author: Laura C. Striplin

customer_reviews.title: No Good
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a translucent powder, this isn't one I recommend. I don't understand why they design it where it makes a mess everytime you use it. There's white powder residue every where. Also don't feel it helped as it seems to wash me out. Not impressed. Needs better application process.
customer_reviews.author: Cat R.

customer_reviews.title: I have been buying this for a few months now
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much only use this to seal my makeup. A little goes a VERY long way. I used to wear it over foundation, but now I just put on moisturizer and dust this over it to keep my face from getting greasy during the day and it works very well. I also put it over my eyeshadow/eyeliner after applying, and it keeps it from "stamping" onto my upper eyelid.
customer_reviews.author: chuckleduck

customer_reviews.title: Makes my olive skin tone look like a ghost
customer_reviews.text: It works really well. I have only 4 stars only bc it whitens so much. I do like the feel of it though. It's really soft and we'll ground. Better than my mineral powders.
customer_reviews.author: Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could give this zero stars.....
customer_reviews.text: I had very high expectations for this since the reviews were so great...boy was I wrong VERY wrong. Sits right on top of the skin and literally looks like white powder. \:
customer_reviews.author: TheAlez

customer_reviews.title: Better than the expensive stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try this type of powder but wasn't sure if I would like it or not. So I bought the cheapest one I could find that didn't have terrible reviews. I loved it so thought I would like an expensive brand even more. Luckily my friend let me try her name brand expensive stuff, I say luckily because I like this one way better! So did she and she ordered some of this right then and there.
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Personal issues with it
customer_reviews.text: I don't know this made my face feel kind of cakey gave me a ghostly appearance I'm not great at contouring and prefer not to use a bronzer so this is a personal preference I can see this being great for baking though and have kept it for that purpose. On the great side it doesn't really slide into Fine Lines so if you have under eye lines I recommend this for under-eye powder it's the only thing I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Shade989

customer_reviews.title: Great powder
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite translucent powder I’ve been using it for months in my opinion this is the only powder that doesn’t make my face look like a ghost and it blends very well like it was never there. The shine control is impeccable also
customer_reviews.author: Andre Shields

customer_reviews.title: This is great to set your under eye concealer!
customer_reviews.text: This product caught my eye when I was watching a make up video online. I decided to take a chance and order this and I'm glad I did. It is light weight, translucent and doesn't have a strong smell. I use it to set my under eye make up and it works well. I would purchase this again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boo! You’re a ghost.
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. I look like a zombie. I guess it would be good for Halloween. Horrible flashback.
customer_reviews.author: T.Graham

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It's a bit dry at first, but it helped to keep my oily T-zone matte for much longer than it normally does without the powder, which is awesome. Also helped to keep my eye makeup from smudging. Wish is lasted longer, but this really helped me regardless :). And it looked nice and natural in person & in photos. It's super small, but I don't use makeup often at all so this will last me a long time. This wouldn't last long for anyone who uses makeup on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: No lid upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have ordered it before. This time i received it without a lid. Not like the lid had fallen off in transport there was no lid. Luckily there is a protective screen over it so the powder did not make a mess, it is still contained and useable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase, love it.
customer_reviews.text: This finishing powder lasted over a year the first time. I repurchased. Its good for summer and winter. Make sure you have the right kabuki brush. Brush lightly, you don't need a lot. Good for all skin tones. I'm asian. I let my friend borrow it once, she's caucasian. It was good on both of us.
customer_reviews.author: TeeTopher

customer_reviews.title: Excellence at it's Best!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy! Packaging was up to par and it helps my product to stay on much longer than usual. The weather was crappy when I went out for my Saturday night escapade and when I got home, my makeup was exactly as it was when I left hours before. Perfect! Will be buying again :)
customer_reviews.author: BriWilks

customer_reviews.title: You should definitely give this product a chance !
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using a setting powder, and I wasn’t disappointed. It helped the areas where i usually creased to not crease, and basically smoothed everything out. It also just evens the makeup. I actually recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Its okay.
customer_reviews.text: So the container is less than half way full. It works very well. Keeps makeup from separating. But does tend to leave a powdery residue on some places, especially if you have peach fuzz, and on the nostrils.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Makes your skin look flawless
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! It really sets my CC cream and concealer. It absorbs oil without drying my skin out. I would have given it 5 stars however it does make my skin look a little pale so I add extra bronzer before I apply this product.
customer_reviews.author: wiretag

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, but effective
customer_reviews.text: This is a super light dusting powder, useful for setting any areas where you've "corrected" the color or concealed a blemish. Unscrew the lid to reveal a shaker top; tap out the small quantity you need without making (too much of) a mess. Translucent white powder works for me, a pale white woman, but may be ashy on darker complexions.
customer_reviews.author: Goat girlTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Works great to set your make up. My skin is oily and this helps my make up stay on longer and not shine due to the oil.
customer_reviews.author: Cayla

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: If you have dry skin and enjoy looking like you have mudcracks on your face this is definitely the powder for you! I wore this over very dewy foundation for 12+ hours and my makeup did not budge, but the longer it sat on my face the better it looked. Once my natural oils came through it I went from Sahara desert to blurred snap chat filter.
customer_reviews.author: Cindol R

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I was looking into buying a more expensive setting powder but wanted to try this first before spending a ton. This stuff works great! It makes my makeup have a matte finish and keeps my T-zone especially from getting super oily during the day. It doesn't last ALL day but definitely all morning and afternoon. I know some people have problems with setting powder drying their skin out but I haven't had that issue at all. It's white but once applied to face you can't see it - doesn't make your face look lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Photo ready!
customer_reviews.text: For the money I think that this is a GREAT finishing/setting powder. Translucent and does not change the color or tone of my foundation. Hides and blurs imperfections in skin. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: D Roper

customer_reviews.title: Arrived opened and nearly empty....
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived opened and with barely anything in it. I will not try it due to concerns of it already being used.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Love this, can't do without it!
customer_reviews.text: I brush this on before I apply my mineral, loose powder makeup to hide oily areas and mask red areas and large pores. Then, I lightly dust on more. Gives me an even, matte look to my face. I'm 59 and have had waay too much sun in my years.
customer_reviews.author: Beth E

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: It's not my favorite clear powder- I prefer the Mary Kay version. This works pretty great, though, for quite a bit less. It goes on a little more opaque, maybe, and heavy. It does a great job of keeping down shininess, and doesn't wash you out much.
customer_reviews.author: Casey KTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Shows up on flash. But great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality BUT it does NOT pass the flash test. If you don't know what that is when you take a picture with flash you come up with a white powder on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: This hides the dark circles around my eyes.
customer_reviews.text: It works as expected! It helps with the dark circles around my eyes. Application order: PRIMER -> FOUNDATION -> CONCEALER -> AND THEN I APPLY this Translucent "BAKING" POWDER. It hides all my imperfections. SUPER RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Don't like
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product it came all over the place when I open the package other than the presentation being horrible the makeup itself the powder was not right it will have your face looking powdery White
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Nice powder.
customer_reviews.text: This powder is white in the container but looks fine on my fair skin. I use it to powder my nose before misting with some rosewater spray. Price is great for a good amount of powder. I have not noted any irritation or breakouts after using it. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DesDaz

customer_reviews.title: This truly exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help control oil and stop my lipstick from feathering during hot weather. It not only does that but it makes your skin feel silky-smooth.
customer_reviews.author: The Child-like Empress

customer_reviews.title: Feels very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This powder is very light weight and it stays in beautifully! I love the feel of it! I have medium tone skin, so you have to be kind of careful to not get too white under your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Adriely Dantas

customer_reviews.title: No shine!
customer_reviews.text: I love using this because it really helps with the shine. I’ve tried a couple others and some have a funny smell. Was glad to be able to subscribe and save more money by ordering on Amazon. Great product with no smell.
customer_reviews.author: Mtnz Yq

customer_reviews.title: pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product occasionally for about a month now. I have never used any sort of powder (loose or compact) on my face before and this stuff works great. I bought it on a whim when I decided I want to try using product on my face. It removed any oil and shine when placed over my BB cream, and gives me that nice matte look I need! It makes my skin feel soft, too, isn't heavy, and comes off nicely. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Alaina M Butner

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Makes your face soft and makeup smooth. Also lightens your foundation where placed so only use in the highlights of your face
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It didn't give me the translucent effect I expected. I could tell in my pics, didn't like it. I'll try again using a different method later. And it's soo small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fine particles...need not to use very much lasts ha very long time
customer_reviews.text: This powder is very fine and is a white colored "fine dust"you needn't use much either , it's a very good setting powder and works very well with any kind of foundation. I love it, unscented and translucent as well..thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and long lasting setting powder!
customer_reviews.text: Great setting powder and very lightweight. It is long lasting (all day) and takes the shine away. I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Juls S.

customer_reviews.title: Go to Setting Powder for Drug Store Brand
customer_reviews.text: This setting powder does well, especially for drug store brands & pricing. I tried another setting powder brand purchased from amazon but ended experienced breakouts after using it. This works well as a setting power or while using with the baking method. Leaves clean lines unlike some other translucent powder that can leave obvious white powder lines even after blending. This is my quick & easy go to, I always have this on hand in my makeup arsenal. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this! Blurs large pores and fine lines!
customer_reviews.text: This does everything it said it does and more! Blurs large pores and fine lines goes on silky smooth and no build up!! Sets foundation but I don't even use foundation anymore it's that awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: H. Haffner

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite drug store setting powder. I wish more came in the package but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lmandy

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Small container but a little goes a long way. Does exactly what it's meant to do. I find it works best with damp makeup sponge
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: I've had a much better time with essence's waterproof mattifying
customer_reviews.text: I prefer a pressed powder, this is just talc in a plastic container. Also, entirely not waterproof. I've had a much better time with essence's waterproof mattifying powder
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price and works well!
customer_reviews.text: Really have liked this. Have never really used setting powder before but it has helped with my mascara fall out and my eyes look more “awake” throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Softer than baby powder
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so silky smooth, it’s incredible. It’s so light on the face. Almost feels like you’re not wearing anything
customer_reviews.author: zachariah McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: White. It is too white. I mixed with my regular power and it works great that way. But too white without.
customer_reviews.author: Annette DeMaris

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love how fine it is. It goes on very smooth and doesn't irritate my skin. The product is great Just wish there was more in it.
customer_reviews.author: unknown

customer_reviews.title: It's powder
customer_reviews.text: It's good, not great. Doesn't keep the oil away. I do like it but wish it was more oil absorbing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No shine
customer_reviews.text: I have a very oily face...this product keeps me matted for about 6 hours.
customer_reviews.author: JennRZ

customer_reviews.title: Bake away, baby!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for baking your makeup. I absolutely love this setting powder. It doesn’t make you look like a ghost (if used correctly) and it also doesn’t just sit on top of your makeup. It brushes away and blends very beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price but I have used better
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price but I have used better. I needed to reapply about 3 times per day.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: so I am pleased.
customer_reviews.text: This powder is decent. I always have too much/not enough powder in the container, however, so I tend to make a mess with this kind of application. I have cystic acne, and this has not seemed to cause any flareups, so I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: stephjud

customer_reviews.title: It is ok for me for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is ok for me for the price, it applies will, looks great on picks however, it does not matte for long, i have to reapply after 5-6hrs.
customer_reviews.author: TonyD

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Product was used and open. Hardly any powder in the actual container. You can tell someone used it and then put a piece of tape over the holes where the powder comes out and cleaned around it.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Ali

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Always love L'Oreal products, and was not disappointed by this. By far the best I've used for the value. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Savage_TheQueen

customer_reviews.title: Tried more kinds of powder than I care to admit...
customer_reviews.text: My favorite translucent powder ever. And I’ve tried some pretty expensive, well-reviewed stuff. Its matte, doesn’t discolor concealer/foundation, and doesn’t cast a nasty powdery sheen. Looking oily half-way through the day is an almost nonexistent problem too. Honestly, this is my ideal setting powder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really does hide my pores well.
customer_reviews.text: Gives my makeup a flawless finish and it really does hide my large pores!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job
customer_reviews.text: The product does set cream makeup products very nicely. I was happy that the product did not come damaged.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Good product for less
customer_reviews.text: Great for setting makeup and eliminating crease. No flash back
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Black

customer_reviews.title: Great but not much product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, actually translucent unlike some others. However there’s not very much in the package so it doesn’t last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Hardly any product
customer_reviews.text: There’s hardly any product at all in the container. I wish I had read other reviews before buying
customer_reviews.author: Amber valdes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is outstanding....it actually does what it says. It stays on for a very long time...I will diffidently stock up....
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Great setting powder
customer_reviews.text: I love this setting powder. It definitely keeps the oil under control and feels so light. I use this everyday even when I don’t wear other makeup. Way better than more expensive brands that I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Only good if you're keeping away the shine doesn't actually fix anything
customer_reviews.text: It definitely kept the shine away for a couple hours but it did nothing to do earn the name Master fix. it did nothing for my complexion or my pores
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! It keeps my oil-prone skin matte all day! Despite being white it doesn't make me look ghostly and just does a fabulous job of keeping shine away!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecka

customer_reviews.title: Touch up
customer_reviews.text: Works great for that mid day touch up so light weight great value as well
customer_reviews.author: jami

customer_reviews.title: Love this !
customer_reviews.text: Use every single day. It’s great for filling in spots and dark patches.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B. P

customer_reviews.title: Nice Powder
customer_reviews.text: Great light weight powder. wish it didn’t make my skin look quite as pale .. but it’s very Matt and very pretty on. The packaging is not convenient to carry in my purse. It fine to leave on the vanity and just use in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Works for whatever
customer_reviews.text: I have this in my makeup bag in case I need fixing up. I don't use it to often but I have messed with it. It definitely cleans up
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to bake my makeup after I ran out of a MUCH more expensive brand. I have very oily skin & I have to place powder on my tzone. This works great for a great price. I really like it. Haven't looked white in any flash pictures so far.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Price

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it works very well . My make up stays in place and I don't have to worry about touching up ! It's also a great price vs other products of the same type.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Very light powder that blends well, and gives a flawless looking finish!
customer_reviews.author: SagerGreen

customer_reviews.title: Not translucent
customer_reviews.text: A decent powder, but not translucent. Not the best for tanned skin
customer_reviews.author: Sophia WD

customer_reviews.title: Soaks up oils
customer_reviews.text: Soaks up excess oils on the face, like it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: but this has worked great. Keeps my eyeliner from smudging and wearing off ...
customer_reviews.text: Never used a finishing powder before, but this has worked great. Keeps my eyeliner from smudging and wearing off by noon!
customer_reviews.author: remodeling chic

customer_reviews.title: Great Coverage
customer_reviews.text: I tried it for the first time. This product is comparable to and less expensive than the NYX HD Finishing powder, which I’ve used for years.
customer_reviews.author: Ms P

customer_reviews.title: As far as setting powders go this is a nice silky formula
customer_reviews.text: As far as setting powders go this is a nice silky formula. I would have liked if it came with a poof or applicator brush. So far on my sensitive skin I have not noticed any irritation.
customer_reviews.author: sabakunoardent

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I love it! Totally met my expectations! Perfect bake-age.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight coverage
customer_reviews.text: Needs more in the container for the $$, but great product
customer_reviews.author: STRESSED-MAMA

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: There is a reason I dont by drug store brand makeup and this reminded me why. Super chalky and just stays white on your face. I used it once and now it lives in a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Made my face look super caked on
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this. It made my face super cake like and not a pretty look.
customer_reviews.author: SugarSawdust

customer_reviews.title: Barely any product
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is fine but there is barely anything in the container. I got a replacement and there was hardly any product in that as well. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Klee

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The powder feels good when applied but I’m not sure I would but it again. Not a great Value for your money as you get very little product in the container. It does make your skin very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Not too happy

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Light weight but you only have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Light weight but you only have to use a little for it to go a long way. Love it. Must have staple in your mameup repertoir.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Bingel

customer_reviews.title: Loooove!!!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this product sooo much! It is definitely a master fix, apply it as a top layer for your foundation contour etc. Your skin will look great!
customer_reviews.author: Noelia

customer_reviews.title: My new go to
customer_reviews.text: This is my new powder go to. Great price, excellent application and wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Kay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Gives me a smooth look unlike my previous ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Gives me a smooth look unlike my previous powder. Doesn't affect the color of your foundation at all and makes your skin soft!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Anhalt

product_meta.title: Maybelline New York Facestudio Master Fix Setting + Perfecting Loose Powder Makeup, Translucent, 2 Count
product_meta.description: Size:2 Count| Color:TranslucentThis silky loose powder creates a flawless finish to your look while controlling shine all day. The weightless powder blurs as it mattifies, keeping you looking your best.
feature_bullets: Sets makeup and mattifies, blurs, and smoothes
Creates a soft focus effect as it sets makeup

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
